team.memberAlreadyInTeam: The invited user is already part of another team. Please contact our support team at info@supertext.com to have the person assigned to a new team.

modal.zeroPayableNowOnTrialPeriod: Additional licenses are free of charge during the trial period and will be charged at the end of the next billing period.

outOfBusinessHours.title: Unfortunately, you can reach us outside our business hours

footerNote.text: Your question was <highlight>not included</highlight>? Then please <highlight>Contact</highlight> with us.

caseList.title: At home in any area. Handmade, AI-supported or fully automated.

verificationPayment.title: That worked!
verificationPayment.description: A Supertext expert will now check your text. You will receive the verified translation at the e-mail address you provided.
